```{r echo = F, results = 'asis', cache=FALSE}
posts = dir('./blog', full = TRUE)
linkName <- gsub("_", " ", posts)
linkName <- gsub("(^|[[:space:]])([[:alpha:]])", "\\1\\U\\2", linkName, perl = TRUE)
library(stringr)
substr(linkName, 18, 18) <- "&"
linkName <- gsub("&", " &raquo; ", linkName)
date <- substr(linkName, 8, 26)
postName <- substr(linkName, 27, 70)

links = paste0("- ", date, "[", basename(postName), "]", "(", posts, "/index.html)")
length <- length(posts) - 4
writeLines(links[rev(seq(length))])
```
